issue.title: [Release] Generate the API docs in ubuntu 20.10
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13080](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13080). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I noticed that the ubuntu build variable is passed as a runtime environment variable to the container: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/release/post-09-docs.sh#L49
